bibl.title: The Coinage of Vabalathus and Zenobia from Antioch and Alexandria.
bibl.note: Aims at setting out the current state of knowledge on the coinage of Valabathus and Zenobia and seeing how this can be related to a reconstruction of the events of the Palmyrene revolt as given in the historical accounts. - The historical background. - The coinage. - The Alexandrian coinage. - Catalogue.
bibl.seg: Roger Bland, The Coinage of Vabalathus and Zenobia from Antioch and Alexandria.

Aims at setting out the current state of knowledge on the coinage of Valabathus and Zenobia and seeing how this can be related to a reconstruction of the events of the Palmyrene revolt as given in the historical accounts. - The historical background. - The coinage. - The Alexandrian coinage. - Catalogue.
